2090480.name: War of Bellrook
2090480.description:
Begin a journey in the world of Bellrook as you advance through one of six stories all centered around a war taking place in the Kingdom of Bellrook. Each story is different and has many paths leading to different endings. Control the fate of the story as you make your choices.

You will make choices and drive your characters' narrative through the story with various different endings. Be an Assassin, Mage, Cleric, Soldier, Peasant, or the King himself and lead your character to victory or defeat.
2090480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
